name: raining-in
displayName: RAINING IN V S C O D E
description: Relaxing downpour right in your editor
author: Tor Shepherd

commands.title: RAINING IN V S C O D E: Enable Downpour
RAINING IN V S C O D E: Disable Downpour

configuration.title: RAINING IN V S C O D E

rainingin.raindropColor.description: Set the raindrop color for the rain effect.

rainingin.foregroundOpacity.description: Set the foreground opacity for the raindrop effect. Set this to the highest value you can see the raindrops.

rainingin.raindropMinOpacity.description: Set the raindropMinOpacity value for the rain effect. 0.0 is invisible, 1.0 is opaque.

rainingin.raindropMaxOpacity.description: Set the raindropMaxOpacity value for the rain effect. 0.0 is invisible, 1.0 is opaque.

rainingin.raindropCount.description: Set the raindropCount value for the rain effect. 0 is none, 100 is 100 drops rendered (for example).

rainingin.raindropMinSpeed.description: Set the raindropMinSpeed value for the rain effect in px/s.

rainingin.raindropMaxSpeed.description: Set the raindropMaxSpeed value for the rain effect in px/s.

rainingin.raindropMinDelay.description: Set the raindropMinDelay value for the rain effect. 0.0 is synchronized, 1.0 is average 1 second delay.

rainingin.raindropMaxDelay.description: Set the raindropMaxDelay value for the rain effect. 0.0 is synchronized, 1.0 is average 1 second delay.

rainingin.raindropMinAngle.description: Set the raindropMinAngle value for the rain effect. 0.0 is vertical, 90.0 is horizontal.

rainingin.raindropMaxAngle.description: Set the raindropMaxAngle value for the rain effect. 0.0 is vertical, 90.0 is horizontal.

rainingin.raindropMinSize.description: Set the raindropMinSize value for the rain effect, in how many pixels wide the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindropMaxSize.description: Set the raindropMaxSize value for the rain effect, in how many pixels wide the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindropMinLength.description: Set the raindropMinLength value for the rain effect, in how many pixels long the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindropMaxLength.description: Set the raindropMaxLength value for the rain effect, in how many pixels long the raindrops are.

rainingin.raindropMinFallHeight.description: Set the raindropMinFallHeight value for the rain effect, in how many pixels from the top the raindrops will fall.

rainingin.raindropMaxFallHeight.description: Set the raindropMaxFallHeight value for the rain effect, in how many pixels from the top the raindrops will fall.

rainingin.windowWidth.description: Set the windowWidth for the rain effect. Default = 3840 (4k).

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
